title: Fading Faith Demo
description: Embark on a desperate struggle for survival in Fading Faith, a dark medieval dungeon crawler where light is your only shield. Descend into labyrinthine depths corrupted by the Gold Gouls, your flickering torch the lone beacon against the encroaching shadows.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **SURVIVE THE DUNGEON**
<!--text-->
Saladin's Shadow Looms: You have only five days to navigate the treacherous depths, secure your place in Jerusalem, and emerge victorious before the city is besieged.

<!--image-->
![Fading Faith-c2e93](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ae4e702147f0424082edb0568b3c6160/fading-faith-c2e93.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **WELCOME TO JERUSALEM**
<!--text-->
The Holy City Awaits: Emerge from the darkness with your hard-won gold and seek solace in the sacred city of Jerusalem. Here, the market brims with life-saving consumables, the blacksmith forges weapons of unmatched power, and the training camp offers the chance to hone your skills. But remember, every dented coin earned in the depths could be the difference between life and eternal damnation.

<!--image-->
![Fading Faith-1iatm](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ae4e702147f0424082edb0568b3c6160/fading-faith-1iatm.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **PAY YOUR ROOM**
<!--text-->
Jerusalem city has a harsh reality: paying for a room at the inn is mandatory to start a fresh day. The city guards frown upon beggars, so ensure you factor in the inn's fee before splurging on upgrades in Jerusalem.

<!--image-->
![Fading Faith-um99n](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ae4e702147f0424082edb0568b3c6160/fading-faith-um99n.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **UPGRADE AND WIN**
<!--text-->
Unlock Hidden Potential: Invest in character training and upgrades at the Jerusalem training camp. These enhancements will not only strengthen your combat prowess but also grant you access to previously unreachable areas within the dungeon, potentially revealing shortcuts, hidden chambers, and powerful artifacts that could aid you in your quest.

<!--image-->
![Fading Faith-120kq](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ae4e702147f0424082edb0568b3c6160/fading-faith-120kq.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **ITEMS ARE NOT FOR FREE...**
<!--text-->
Jerusalem – Sanctuary and Supplier… with a Deadline: Utilize your hard-earned gold within the five-day window to purchase life-saving consumables... if you have enough money. Manage your resources meticulously: every coin you gather can mean the difference between escaping the dungeon's clutches and joining the ranks of the damned.

<!--image-->
![Fading Faith-lzlrv](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ae4e702147f0424082edb0568b3c6160/fading-faith-lzlrv.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **FAITH IS ALL YOU HAVE**
<!--text-->
The Temple has some sacred Services at a reasonable price . Only your charity will elevate the spirit of our Lord and remove the sins of your deviated soul.

<!--image-->
![Fading Faith-6zyzn](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/ae4e702147f0424082edb0568b3c6160/fading-faith-6zyzn.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **ECHOES OF THE PAST**
<!--text-->
As you delve deeper into the dungeon's heart, unearth forgotten relics and encounter echoes of prominent figures from history.  Arab philosophers may offer cryptic clues, Roman emperors may guard hidden chambers, and the very fabric of reality may blur as the lines between past and present  weave a tapestry of mystery and intrigue.
